translation.en: American cigarettes suck.
Don't you have Long Lives or Prosperity Island?
translation.it: Non avete le Long Lives o le Prosperity Island?

translation.en: These taste like ass.
But I do like American candy bars. Milky Way, Hershey's, Nestlé Crunch.
translation.it: Ma mi piacciono le barrette americane. Milky Way, Hershey's, Nestlé Crunch.

translation.en: Run to the vending machine.
[Frank] No almonds in the Hershey's.
I asked to talk to you because I don't trust these white people.
translation.it: Ho chiesto di parlare con te perché non mi fido dei bianchi,

translation.en: Or the Black ones.
Or the Mexican.
I only speak with Chinese.
Let me tell you a story.
When I was young, we were really poor.
translation.it: Quando ero giovane, eravamo molto poveri.

translation.en: No money for food, so sometimes my brothers and sisters and I
translation.it: Non avevamo soldi per mangiare, quindi a volte mangiavamo foglie…

translation.en: -would eat boiled tea le-- -Mr. Ma.
I don't have time for this.
I wanna make a deal.
I'll testify against anyone in exchange
translation.it: Testimonierò contro chiunque in cambio dell'immunità

translation.en: for immunity and safe passage home.
translation.it: Testimonierò contro chiunque in cambio dell'immunità e del rientro a casa.

translation.en: All right.
I'm listening.
But I have one question.
Did you arrest Big Sun?
Is he one of the ones killed?
According to the latest information, no.
He seems to have escaped. -For now. -Huh.
translation.it: Sembra che per ora sia scappato.

translation.en: Then you get nothin' from me,
until Big Sun is in one of these cages.
translation.it: Voglio Big Sun in una di queste celle.

translation.en: 'Cause that motherfucker needs to be brought down,
and I'm not risking talking to you if he's still out there.
translation.it: Non voglio rischiare di parlare se lui è ancora a piede libero.

translation.en: [Alexis] I don't know where Big Sun is.
translation.it: Non so dove sia Big Sun.

translation.en: He may have fled the country by now.
So fucking find him.
I can make all of your cases,
translation.it: Ti farò vincere ogni tuo caso,

translation.en: make you famous,
but only
if you get Big Sun.
[Bruce] Should've just paid for the kitchenette instead of this thing.
translation.it: Dovevamo prenderne una con la cucina.

translation.en: [Mama] For how long we're staying, this thing is cheaper.
translation.it: Questa è meno cara, visto quanto resteremo.

translation.en: How long are we staying?
Mom?
[Mama] We should be safe for now.
I wonder if they're still alive to come after us.
translation.it: Chi sa se sono ancora vivi per venire a cercarci.

translation.en: [Bruce] Well, maybe we can call Charles?
[exhales] Or Dad, even?
Why do you think they would help you after what you've done?
translation.it: Perché pensi che ti aiuterebbero dopo ciò che hai fatto?

translation.en: You told the Boxers about the meeting.
How could you?
You brother, your father, your blood was there.
translation.it: Tuo fratello, tuo padre, il tuo sangue era lì.

translation.en: I was there. [sighs]
You? You weren't supposed to be!
I had a plan!
All you had to do was have dinner at the hotel and wait,
translation.it: Dovevi solo cenare in hotel e aspettare.

translation.en: and you couldn't even do that?
translation.it: Non sei riuscito a fare neanche questo!

translation.en: [Bruce] A plan for you to take over?
translation.it: Il tuo piano era farti eleggere?

translation.en: To… to be the Dragon Man?
Dragon Head!
Mom. Uh…
I know you, okay? Uh…
You get overwhelmed trying to get your Alexa to play music.
translation.it: Anche usare Alexa per riprodurre la musica ti stressa.

translation.en: You always make me drive at night because you get lost.
translation.it: Mi fai guidare sempre di notte perché ti perdi.

translation.en: [sighs] You buy six pasta strainers
because they were on sale.
We never eat pasta!
translation.it: E non mangiamo mai la pasta!

translation.en: Mom.
Stop. Stop. Look at me.
You are not a crime boss.
You are my mom.
Wouldn't it be nice to go back to that?
To how things were?
I left everything behind for you.
Scrubbed toilets so we can eat.
translation.it: Ho pulito gabinetti per poter mangiare.

translation.en: Skipped meals so you can have a backpack like the other kids.
translation.it: Ho digiunato per farti avere uno zaino come gli altri bambini.

translation.en: But not once…
not once did anybody ask me what I wanted!
translation.it: neanche una, qualcuno mi ha chiesto cosa volessi io!

translation.en: I want what is mine, Bruce!
translation.it: Voglio ciò che è mio, Bruce!

translation.en: I want what I have earned!
[crying] I… I… I…
Oh, hey.
Oh, nice!
-Any pings on Charles Sun's phone? -Uh…
translation.it: Novità dal telefono di Charles Sun?

translation.en: No. Phone's probably dead.
[Alexis sighs] Just notify me the second that phone gets plugged back in.
translation.it: Avvisami appena il telefono viene riacceso.

translation.en: I put an APB out for Charles Sun citywide.
translation.it: Ho un mandato di arresto per Charles Sun.

translation.en: Uh, didn't we already catch the bad guys?
translation.it: Non abbiamo già preso i cattivi?

translation.en: If we wanna indict the bad guys,
and not just release them back into the world,
we need to bring in Big Sun.
The only person who knows where he is is the guy who owns that phone.
translation.it: e l'unico che sa dov'è è il proprietario di quel telefono.

translation.en: So find him!
Stupid. Stupid.
Fuck!
Why? Why?
[sobbing] Please stop. Please!
-Please. -You betrayed us.
translation.it: Ti prego. - Ci hai traditi. - Mi dispiace.

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -Stop saying you're sorry!
translation.it: - Ci hai traditi. - Mi dispiace. Smettila di scusarti!

translation.en: I was just trying to protect our family!
translation.it: Volevo solo proteggere la nostra famiglia!

translation.en: Fuck!
We need to talk.
[Charles] We think they have Frank Ma and a couple of other ghosts in custody.
translation.it: Hanno in custodia Frank Ma e un paio di altri fantasmi.

translation.en: Anyone not locked up already is dead.
translation.it: Chi non è in cella è morto.

translation.en: [Mama] And your father?
In hiding.
Working on a way to get back to Taiwan with me, Xing, and the surviving Wang Bros.
translation.it: Cerca un modo per tornare a Taiwan con me, Xing e i fratelli Wang.

translation.en: I don't understand how the police knew about the meeting.
translation.it: Non capisco come la polizia sapesse dell'incontro.

translation.en: Maybe the Boxers told them?
Why?
The Boxers could have killed everyone if the police didn't show up.
translation.it: I Boxer avrebbero potuto uccidere tutti senza polizia.

translation.en: The police must have an informant.
How did you find us?
I searched every motel that'd be filled with shady people
translation.it: Ho perquisito tutti i motel pieni di gente losca

translation.en: that knew how to keep their mouths shut.
This was the only one with a lime-green Lamborghini out front.
translation.it: Questo era l'unico con una Lamborghini verde fuori.

translation.en: So, what's the plan?
Everything I set in motion got blown up.
translation.it: È andato tutto a monte, ormai.

translation.en: I… I don't have a plan.
It was Ba who sent me here to kill Bruce.
translation.it: Ba mi ha mandato qui a uccidere Bruce.

translation.en: Wow. [sniffles]
[Charles] I couldn't.
I tried, but I couldn't.
translation.it: Ci ho provato, ma non ce l'ho fatta.

translation.en: That is, like,
going to lead to, like, decades of therapy. [sighs]
I am trapped, Bruce.
I can't kill you, and if I don't, I can't go back to Ba.
translation.it: Non riesco a ucciderti, ma, se non lo faccio, non posso tornare da Ba.

translation.en: There's only one way out.
You need to kill Dad.
-What? Did you learn fucking nothing? -No, no! No, no!
translation.it: - Non hai imparato un cazzo? - No!

translation.en: -[Bruce sniffling] -[sighs] He doesn't understand.
Understand what?
What it means to be a father's son.
translation.it: Cosa significa essere il figlio di un padre.

translation.en: I understand what it means to be a brother.
translation.it: So cosa significa essere un fratello.

translation.en: I understand that I have,
and will do anything to protect you.
translation.it: e farò di tutto per proteggerti.

translation.en: It's important
you understand your father was never…
translation.it: che tu capisca che tuo padre non è mai stato

translation.en: never on your side.
All he ever wanted was a soldier with unwavering loyalty.
translation.it: Voleva solo un soldato dalla lealtà assoluta.

translation.en: The kind of loyalty he could only get from a son.
translation.it: Il tipo di lealtà che poteva ottenere solo da un figlio.

translation.en: And he saw the potential in you.
translation.it: Ha visto quel potenziale in te.

translation.en: A killer is only born
when he tastes blood for the first time.
translation.it: quando assaggia il sangue per la prima volta.

translation.en: The Chairleg incident…
it wasn't an assassination attempt.
It was a test.
I should have pushed back,
but I had to save
at least one of my sons from him.
translation.it: almeno uno dei miei figli da lui.

translation.en: [softly] I'm sorry.
[Mama] I am sorry.
[Bruce] Charles.
Run away with us.
Forget Dad.
Forget Chairleg.
You could be Charles "Churro Maker" Sun.
translation.it: Puoi diventare Charles "Friggitore di churro" Sun.

translation.en: I can't just leave.
I have to tell him face-to-face.
Then tell him.
It won't be easy.
He won't want to let him go.
He has to at least try.
This is your chance.
The only power he has right now
is the power that you give him.
translation.it: è il potere che gli dai tu.

translation.en: Mom's right.
He won't let me go.
Even after everything he's made you do,
translation.it: Dopo tutto ciò che ti ha fatto fare,

translation.en: you don't even wanna try?
You… you can't look him in the eye and tell him that it's over?
translation.it: Non riesci a guardarlo negli occhi e dirgli basta?

translation.en: That you wanna live a normal life?
translation.it: Che vuoi vivere una vita normale?

translation.en: -[sobbing] -[whispers] Charles.
He wanted you
to come here and kill me in front of Mom.
translation.it: venissi qui e mi uccidessi davanti a mamma.

translation.en: Look at me!
It's him
or us.
Do what you must.
Hold on. You accidentally wore my jacket to the meeting.
translation.it: Aspetta. Ti sei messo per sbaglio la mia giacca alla riunione.

translation.en: This is yours.
Your phone is in the pocket, but it's out of juice.
translation.it: Hai il telefono in tasca, ma è scarico.

translation.en: I have a charger. It's hard to find for your old phone.
translation.it: Ho un caricabatterie, anche se il tuo telefono è antiquato.

translation.en: [Charles] I don't understand how the police knew about the meeting.
translation.it: Non capisco come la polizia sapesse dell'incontro.

translation.en: [Mama] The police must have an informant.
-Do you have a charger? -For a flip phone? No.
translation.it: - Hai un caricatore? - Per quel coso? No.

translation.en: Chuck, please tell me you capped that clown.
translation.it: Chuck, dimmi che hai ucciso quell'idiota.

translation.en: I would have merked that zhutou with my bare hands.
Shut up, assholes! It was his brother.
Give me a moment with my father.
[in Mandarin] Dad,
how are you doing?
Are you okay?
This situation we are in,
it's the opportunity of a lifetime.
The leadership of the Triads has been crushed.
translation.it: Il potere delle Triadi è stato annientato.

translation.en: All of the ghosts are dead or arrested,
translation.it: Tutti i fantasmi sono morti o in arresto,

translation.en: but their organizations still exist.
Their businesses. Their soldiers. And no one to lead them.
translation.it: Gli affari, i soldati. E nessuno che li guidi.

translation.en: Let's go back to Taiwan,
consolidate all of them.
Everything will be run through the Jade Dragons.
Everyone will work for us.
It will take time and some corpses,
translation.it: Ovviamente, ci vorranno tempo e vittime,

translation.en: but it will be glorious.
How did it go with your brother?
Was your mother there to watch?
translation.it: Tua madre era lì a guardare?

translation.en: I know it was difficult.
I wanted to kill a son as little as you wanted to kill a brother,
translation.it: Non volevi uccidere un fratello e io non volevo uccidere un figlio,

translation.en: but to protect the family,
it needed to be done.
I couldn't do it.
Dad, what kind of life are we living
translation.it: Papà, ma che razza di vita facciamo

translation.en: if protecting the family means killing my family?
translation.it: se proteggere la famiglia significa ucciderla?

translation.en: Power is not free.
I don't want to go back to Taiwan.
I want to stay here with Bruce and Mom.
translation.it: Voglio restare qui con Bruce e mamma.

translation.en: I don't want this life anymore.
But I want your blessing to leave it.
translation.it: Ma voglio la tua benedizione per lasciarla.

translation.en: There is only one way out of this life,
translation.it: C'è solo una via d'uscita da questa vita

translation.en: and you know that.
You said it yourself,
the Triads as we have known them for centuries are destroyed.
translation.it: Le Triadi come le conosciamo sono ormai distrutte.

translation.en: And you are going to rebuild them for yourself.
You get to make the rules now.
If I destroy tradition,
I am no better than the Boxers.
We operate in a world of killers and thieves.
translation.it: Agiamo in un mondo di assassini e ladri.

translation.en: Without tradition to bind us to a code of conduct,
translation.it: Se non siamo legati a un codice di condotta,

translation.en: no one would ever be safe.
Who is really safe, Dad?
translation.it: Siamo mai davvero al sicuro, papà?

translation.en: Who has ever been kept safe by the old ways?
translation.it: Chi è mai stato al sicuro grazie alla tradizione?

translation.en: We still kill each other.
Without history and rules, none of it has meaning.
translation.it: Senza storia e regole, niente ha un senso.

translation.en: None of it has meaning anyway!
translation.it: Ma niente di tutto questo ha un senso!

translation.en: In one day, all of that history was shot to hell.
translation.it: In un giorno, tutta questa tradizione è stata bruciata.

translation.en: We aren't an idea.
We are just gangs of men fighting over property.
translation.it: Siamo solo uomini che combattono per gli averi.

translation.en: Better to be a cookie maker?
To bake cakes for children's parties?
translation.it: Fare le torte per i bambini?

translation.en: Whatever that is.
Better to be my own man.
translation.it: è meglio essere un uomo così.

translation.en: -if you didn't turn me into a killer. -[pounds table]
translation.it: Ma mi hai reso un assassino.

translation.en: The only thing you are leaving is this country. It's made you soft.
translation.it: L'unica cosa che lascerai è questo Paese. Ti ha reso debole!

translation.en: Thank God I sent your mother and brother away.
translation.it: Grazie a Dio, ho mandato via tua madre e Bruce.

translation.en: Who knows what you would have become then?
This place corrupts everyone,
even the strong ones.
It's why I had Xing follow you to see where your mother and brother are.
translation.it: Perciò ho chiesto a Xing di seguirti per trovare tua madre e tuo fratello.

translation.en: Things you could not do, they will do it.
translation.it: Rimedieranno loro a ciò che non hai fatto.

translation.en: [Justin, in English] Look.
Don't make us do this, bro.
[in Mandarin] Charles!
[in English] Xing, stop!
-[siren whooping] -Fuck!
They don't have shrimp chips in the machine.
You have to let me go.
I can't tell you why, and I know that's a lot to ask,
translation.it: Non posso dirti perché. So che ti chiedo tanto,

translation.en: but you're just gonna have to trust me.
I will let you go.
After you tell me where your father is.
translation.it: ma devi dirmi dov'è tuo padre.

translation.en: I can't do that.
I can get you immunity, protection. I can even get you back to Taiwan.
translation.it: Posso darti immunità, protezione. Posso farti tornare a Taiwan.

translation.en: I'm gonna put him away, Charles.
-And you'll be safe, I promise. -Fuck you.
And fuck your promises.
Last time you tried to help me, you stuck a tracker on my phone.
translation.it: L'ultima volta, mi hai messo un GPS nel telefono.

translation.en: Well, legally, you gave me permission.
translation.it: Legalmente, mi hai dato il permesso.

translation.en: You are so full of shit.
You act like you try to help people,
but really, you're just in it for the power.
translation.it: ma in realtà vuoi solo il potere.

translation.en: -You're just a gangster with a badge. -Don't you fucking compare us.
translation.it: - Sei una criminale col distintivo. - Non paragonarci, cazzo.

translation.en: You kill people for a living.
I saw what you did at the driving range, at the Golden Soup.
translation.it: Ho visto cos'hai fatto al campo da golf, al Golden Soup.

translation.en: If I was in your way, would you kill me?
I would never hurt you.
translation.it: Non ti farei mai del male.

translation.en: I don't pretend to be a good person,
translation.it: Non fingo di essere un brav'uomo,

translation.en: but I have never lied to you.
translation.it: ma non ti ho mai mentito.

translation.en: So, now what?
You go and arrest my father,
and then run for governor
translation.it: e ti candidi a governatrice con suo figlio,

translation.en: with his retired Taiwanese assassin son by your side?
translation.it: e ti candidi a governatrice con suo figlio, un ex assassino, al tuo fianco?

translation.en: I don't know.
But I know you'll be safe.
translation.it: ma so che sarai al sicuro.

translation.en: You have to let me go.
You can't keep me here.
You discharged a weapon in a crowded intersection.
translation.it: Hai sparato in un incrocio affollato.

translation.en: I can hold you here for as long as I want. Where is Big Sun?
translation.it: Posso trattenerti quanto voglio. Dov'è Big Sun?

translation.en: Why are you protecting him? Your code?
translation.it: Perché lo proteggi? Per il codice?

translation.en: He would let you rot in prison, Charles. Do something for yourself for once.
translation.it: Ti lascerebbe marcire in prigione! Fai qualcosa per te, per una volta.

translation.en: This isn't for me.
My mother, my brother,
their lives are in danger.
translation.it: le loro vite sono in pericolo.

translation.en: I need to go get them safe.
Then I promise I will come back, and you can have the full interrogation.
translation.it: e poi giuro che tornerò e potrai interrogarmi.

translation.en: How am I supposed to explain that?
"I let him go so he can kill the people that are hunting his family?"
translation.it: "L'ho liberato così può uccidere chi minaccia la sua famiglia?"

translation.en: -You're not the only one bound by rules. -Please, Alexis.
translation.it: - Non sei l'unico vincolato dalle regole! - Ti prego.

translation.en: [gasps] This is my family.
Please.
Just think about what I said.
translation.it: Pensa a cosa ti ho detto.

translation.en: Wait.
No, Alexis.
Alexis, please! Wait!
Please!
[screams] You're sentencing them to death!
Fuck!
Drop the knife.
Bruce not here?
I'm not supposed to kill you,
but if you get in my way, I will.
translation.it: ma, se mi intralci, lo farò.

translation.en: [sighs] So he sent you to kill his own son.
translation.it: Ti ha mandata a uccidere suo figlio.

translation.en: How do you know he's not gonna send someone to kill you one day?
translation.it: Come sai che non ucciderà te un giorno?

translation.en: Because I would never betray him like you.
translation.it: Perché non lo tradirei mai come te.

translation.en: You really thought you could be Dragon Head?
translation.it: Pensavi davvero di poter essere la Testa di Drago?

translation.en: You don't have the stomach.
You come in to my house,
eat at my table, and try to kill my son?
translation.it: mangi con noi e cerchi di uccidere mio figlio?

translation.en: Hey, uh… got the milk.
Mom! Wh…
Wait, are… are you okay?
-Ai yo! -Wh--
This is condensed milk. I wanted evaporated milk.
translation.it: Questo è latte condensato, non concentrato.

translation.en: It's different!
-I know! They didn't have it! -[groans]
Hold on, okay? St… stop, stop!
Uh, dead body, into the bathroom.
[sighs] I have to make dinner again. Mom, stop. Just… just breathe!
translation.it: - Dovrò rifare la cena da capo. - Mamma, smettila. Respira.

translation.en: Breathe, okay?
Just take a second, will you?
-[phone ringing] -[quietly] One second.
-[Bruce] Hello? -[groans]
Uh, how did you get this number?
Hi, Bruce.
Do you remember me, Alexis Kong?
translation.it: Ti ricordi di me, Alexis Kong?

translation.en: I was friends with your brother growing up.
translation.it: Ero amica di Charles da piccola.

translation.en: I think the last time I saw you, you were probably five or six years old.
translation.it: L'ultima volta che ti ho visto avevi cinque o sei anni.

translation.en: Where's my brother?
[Alexis] Follow me.
Your brother cares a lot about you and your mom.
translation.it: Tiene molto a te e a tua madre.

translation.en: I don't know if he told you, but the day after the Ka Spa, he was with me, and…
translation.it: Non so se te l'ha detto, ma il giorno dopo la Ka Spa, era con me e…

translation.en: his biggest concern was that you and your mom were safe.
translation.it: era preoccupato per la sicurezza tua e di tua madre.

translation.en: What did you arrest him for?
-[sniffles] -Well, he's in a lot of trouble, Bruce,
translation.it: Beh, è in guai seri, Bruce.

translation.en: and I'm trying to help him, but he won't listen.
translation.it: Io voglio aiutarlo, ma non mi ascolta.

translation.en: So maybe he'll listen to you.
Look.
All I need to know is where your father is hiding.
translation.it: Devo solo sapere dove si nasconde tuo padre.

translation.en: If I can bring in Big Sun,
you and Charles can walk out of here free.
You won't charge him with anything?
Not even for discharging a firearm in public and assault with a deadly weapon.
translation.it: Né per aver sparato in pubblico, né per aggressione a mano armata.

translation.en: It's your father I want, Bruce.
translation.it: È tuo padre che voglio, Bruce.

translation.en: Okay.
But… [sighs]
…if I'm going to talk to him, I need real privacy.
translation.it: per parlare con lui mi serve privacy vera.

translation.en: -[sobbing] -Of course.
Okay? No… no cameras, or guards or anything.
[crying] This is going to destroy our family.
Please. [sniffles]
Let us be alone.
-Of course. I'll go arrange it. -Okay.
translation.it: Certo. - Ci penso io. - Va bene.

translation.en: Where's Mom?
She's okay.
Um… Xing came to see her.
And?
And, uh… [sniffs]
…Mom talked to her…
translation.it: mamma le ha parlato con decisione

translation.en: sternly, and now…
translation.it: mamma le ha parlato con decisione e ora Xing non è più un problema.

translation.en: Xing is no longer a problem.
translation.it: e ora Xing non è più un problema.

translation.en: I didn't know Mom could fight.
I'm starting to think neither of us know Mom at all.
translation.it: Penso che nessuno di noi due la conosca.

translation.en: I need you to tell me where Dad is.
Is that why Alexis sent you? I can't.
translation.it: Per questo Alexis ti ha chiamato? Non posso.

translation.en: I feel like I've lost so much of who I think I am.
translation.it: Sento di aver perso molto di chi credo di essere.

translation.en: If I give him up,
there'll be none of me left.
I get it.
Fuck the cops.
This is family business.
Which is why I made Alexis agree to turn off all the cameras.
translation.it: Per questo ho chiesto ad Alexis di spegnere tutte le telecamere.

translation.en: I need you to tell me where Dad is because…
I'm going to kill him.
And how are you gonna do that?
-You gonna improvise him to death? -No!
-I have Xing's gun in the car. -You've never shot a gun before.
translation.it: - Ho la pistola di Xing in auto. - Non hai mai sparato.

translation.en: The first time you do, you'll use it to kill your father?
translation.it: E vuoi imparare per uccidere tuo padre?

translation.en: I played laser tag with TK in Sherman Oaks,
translation.it: Ho giocato a laser tag con TK a Sherman Oaks

translation.en: and I was actually pretty good at it.
And I kicked your ass at that shooting game at John Cho's.
translation.it: E ti ho fatto il culo da John Cho.

translation.en: -Bruce, come on! -Listen!
This is the only chance you and I and Mom will ever be safe,
translation.it: È l'unico modo per salvare te, me e mamma.

translation.en: and it has to happen before Dad goes back to Taiwan.
translation.it: Deve succedere prima che papà torni a Taiwan.

translation.en: You can't do it,
but I can,
